description: Updates the type of medium changer in a tape gateway. When you activate a tape gateway, you select a medium changer type for the tape gateway. This operation enables you to select a different type of medium changer after a tape gateway is activated. This operation is only supported in the tape gateway type.

parameters.name: VTLDeviceARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the medium changer you want to select.

parameters.name: DeviceType
parameters.description: The type of medium changer you want to select. Valid Values: STK-L700 | AWS-Gateway-VTL | IBM-03584L32-0402

nested_items.name: VTLDeviceARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the medium changer you have selected.
